  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109962</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109962</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Casparian strips</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Casparian Streifen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bandes de Casparian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tiras de Casparian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strisce di Casparian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λουρίδες Casparian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tiras de Casparian</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how suberin deposits or Casparian strips close the apoplast and symplast paths as plant cells get older.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">apoplast path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Casparian strip</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">suberin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">symplast path</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Suberinablagerungen 
oder Casparian Streifen die apoplast und symplast Pfade schließen, 
während Betriebszellen älter werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les dépôts de 
subérine ou les bandes de Casparian ferment les voies d'accès 
d'apoplast et de symplast pendant que les cellules d'usine 
vieillissent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os depósitos do 
suberin ou as tiras de Casparian fecham os trajetos do apoplast e do 
symplast enquanto as pilhas da planta começam mais velhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come i depositi della
suberina o le strisce di Casparian chiudono i percorsi dello symplast 
e del apoplast mentre le cellule della pianta ottengono più vecchie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς suberin οι 
καταθέσεις ή οι λουρίδες Casparian κλείνουν το apoplast και 
symplast τα μονοπάτια καθώς τα κύτταρα φυτών γερνούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo los depósitos 
del suberin o las tiras de Casparian cierran los caminos del apoplast 
y del symplast mientras que las células de la planta consiguen más 
viejas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">apoplast Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Casparian Streifen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebszelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Suberin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">symplast Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voie d'accès d'apoplast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bande de Casparian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cellule d'usine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">subérine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voie d'accès de symplast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trajeto do apoplast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tira de Casparian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pilha da planta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">suberin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trajeto do symplast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percorso del apoplast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Striscia di Casparian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cellula della pianta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">suberina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percorso dello symplast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
